Small Tabs Styleguide

Listing Rollup

Listing rollups are a results microformat that display a bar's daily special. Their role is to quickly communicate the bar's location, specials and bar type in an easily scannable manner.

Longman & Eagle

2657 N Kedzie Ave, Logan Square

  • $7 Domestic Pitchers, $3 Miller Lite Bottles, $4 Four Rebels Lion Bombs
  • $10 8 Chicken Wings & 2 Miller Lite Bottles, $25 20 Chicken Wings & 5 Miller Lite Bottles
  • Sports Bar, Night Club

Small Tabs is a product created by @mattmesker, @patrickgrady and @meskermichael.
